text: syqwl bed alkhayidin fi shanihim min 'ahl alktab: hum thlathtun, raabieuhum klbhm, wayaqul fariq akhr: hum khmst, sadisuhum klbhm, wklam alfariqayn qawl balzn min ghyr dlyl, wataqul jamaeat thaltht: hum sbet, wathaminuhum klbhm, qul -ayha alrswl-: rabiy hu alaelm beddhm, ma yaelam eadaduhum 'iilaa qalil min khlqh. fala tujadil 'ahl alkitab fi eadaduhum 'iilaa jdala zahrana la eumq fyh, bi'ana taquss ealayhim maa akhbrk bih alwhy fhsb, wala tas'aluhum ean eadadihim wahwalhm; fa'iinahum la yaelamun dhlk
